alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Kennebec; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 7:44PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Androscoggin and northern Sagadahoc Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 744 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewiston, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Topsham, Litchfield, Woolwich, Lisbon, Durham, Bowdoin, Bowdoinham, Dresden, Richmond, and Sabattus. This includes Interstate 295 between mile markers 36 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
